attributes.title: This app needs to go away
I would like to speak with the manager please
attributes.review: I would like to talk with whomever it is that designed this app let alone allow it to be published. What I witnessed while using the app was completely bizarre. First there was a blasphemous statement saying to keep America great. But I was very confused did they mean North or South America. Already I felt like I was losing brain cells trying to figure it out. Then as soon as the app loaded I was frightened to see a spray tanned clown. You see I am terrified of clowns do I feel like this should be taken into consideration. Moreover, the color orange is just so last season. You should really keep with the trends. Maybe try blue since you seem to stand up for 40 hour week, blue uniforms over indigenous people, immigrants, women, people in the LGBTQ+ community, the environment, well the list goes on but you get my drift. As I was saying the app is a no-no. After that they asked me for my phone number and I was truly disturbed. Lastly â€œMr. Presidentâ€ to revert back to my first point m, you keep saying you will keep America great but we are currently experiencing a climate crisis, unemployment levels are through the roof, minorities still seldom see justice, inequality is widespread, school shootings have become routine in teenagersâ€™ life, COVID continues rampant through the streets, minimum wages are still unlivable, etc. I believe this is a very misleading statement you claim which I assume is the cause of the poor running your app has had.
